title: 1990년 Ragland 사건
summary: 미국 Louisiana, LA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ragland. 판결일: 1990-08-09. 법원: Supreme Court of Louisiana.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Felicia Toney WILLIAMS v. Alwine Mulhearn RAGLAND
**판결일**: 1990-08-09
**법원**: Supreme Court of Louisiana
**관할**: Louisiana, LA

**판사**: Cole, Lemmon

## 변호인

LeRoy Smith, Tallulah, Mack E. Barham, Robert E. Arceneaux, Gail N. Wise, The Barham Law Firm, New Orleans, for Al-wine Mulhearn Ragland, et al. defendant-applicant., M. Junior Williams, Asst. Dist. Atty., for Felicia Toney Williams plaintiff-respondent.

## 인용

- 567 So. 2d 63

## 판결문 요약


DECREE
The Judgment of the court of appeal is reversed. There is now Judgment in favor of Alwine Mulhearn Ragland, defendant, dismissing Felicia Toney Williams’ suit at her cost.
Reasons for this judgment will follow in due course.
...
